entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
